bug.author: xadupre
bug.summary: Tokenizer does not work if the regular expression includes \b, \w, \d...
bug.description:
Describe the bug The tokenizer uses re2 with set_posit(true), that excludes regular expressions like \w+ System information
OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): all ONNX Runtime installed from (source or binary): from github ONNX Runtime version: from github Python version: 3.7.2
To Reproduce Describe steps/code to reproduce the behavior: Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.
